output:
The easiest way to do it is to dance in a circle
Just keep your elbows in, toe to heel
And again, don't forget to look up, toe to heel
Back and forth, remember, remember
Remember to hold your back straight, keep your cock to her shoulder, toe to heel, toe to heel
Thanks Jessie, come for that bottle of Jack
That night on your porch, you really got me back on track
And thank you Sarah, for everything, for everything else, toe to heel
Keep dancing, keep dancing, toe to heel
